stories.text:
Hey guys, Hello world, I was just wondering, if you guys face the same problem, or am I the only one with this problem. Basically, I find myself very difficult to get on-boarded or to on-board a new dev in a project. There are many challenges in it, like setting up multiple accounts for various tools around, like, a tool for - documenting business logic - API collection - db design - UI designs - store some important files, etc.

I've read this somewhere as well as I feel the same that, on-boarding takes almost 53% of a developers time. I wanted to just...share the pain and start a discussion around the same (it can be a rant too )

Also, is there any tool which can solve this problem of ours?
